112122.content:
Bzzt. Bzzt. Bzzt.

The alarm clock buzzes. Groggily, you reach over and click off the alarm, then climb out from under your sheets. You rub your eyes and brush the hair out of your face before catching a glance at yourself in the mirror. Stranding right there, you can see yourself in your white tank top and pink pajama pants, which brings a smile to your face. How long has it been since you became Amber now? Almost a month? And still, the sight of your new reflection makes you remarkably happy.

After changing into the outfit you laid out for yourself the night before and applying some light makeup (it's amazing what some simple mascara and eyeliner can do), you slip down the stairs. "Good morning Amber!" your mother says chipperly, with an emphasis on the last word since she herself is actually Amber. "Morning mom," you say and make a small bowl of cereal for yourself.

Your mom, in your old body, pops in and says she's heading to school a bit early. You suspect she's probably dating one of the girls at school, but since you and Amber always ran in different crowds it's hard for you to know. Your mom has taken to being you quite well though, it seems. Cutting loose and not having to worry about keeping up her looks or parental responsibilities seems to have done wonders for her mood.

Not that your sister minds any. She still doesn't know you and mom swapped before you swapped with her, but you half-suspect she wouldn't care anyway. For the first two weeks, all she could talk about with you was how great it was to be a model. She's not great at being a mother though, and your mom has started doing the cooking to compensate, but Amber is absolutely in love with her new role. You wonder occasionally about how she's handling being married to your father, but it's not something you really think of asking her about.

You pop in to the bathroom before you head out for the day to make sure your hair is good. Man, I look hot!, you think to yourself. And it's true! In just a few weeks, you've managed to totally adapt to being a woman. Amber's makeup is light but tasteful, her hair is perfectly done, her outfit is cute and flattering, and you've even adopted a lot of her old mannerisms. Smiling proudly, you think to yourself about how awesome it would be if this swap became permanent...

11213.content:
It's hard for you to admit, but you actually had fun doing that photoshoot. There was something strangely affirming about how much attention had been on you, about how your subtlest movements were noticed. It was very different from your norm, which was just throwing on a Tshirt and jeans every morning and calling that good. You realize you're curious about what it might be like to be a woman for a bit.

After a moment, you decide not to go home and go to the mall instead. You need to take this opportunity to experience the other side of the gender fence. And it's not like your mom would just be at home waiting for you. She was at school in your body. At the very least, you had a couple hours to kill. So why not go shopping?

After the taxi takes you to the mall, you head to the nearest clothing store and step in. Rack after rack of womens clothing faces you, and for the first time you realize why it can take women so long to get dressed. There are so many options, so much color, such diverse styles! As a boy, your clothing was pretty standard. As a woman, you could wear pretty much anything.

Leafing through, you grab a couple of items you think look nice and head into a changing room. The door closes behind you and you look in the full length mirror to see your mother's reflection staring back at you. It's still so weird to realize I'm her right now, you think as your eyes meet the beautiful face reflected at you. You glance down to see the ample breasts pushing out from your top. You'd not really checked this body out before- everything was so fast at the shoot and it was weird being your own mother- but you knew you were going to be seeing skin trying on these outfits. That should have still felt weird, but oddly you were okay with it. Your mom had taken your body for the day. Surely she knew you'd both be seeing each others' bodies at some point. So what the hell.

"Here goes nothing," you say and pull off the top, revealing two ample breasts held back in a black bra. Her jeans slide off to reveal lacy panties, and you pose momentarily to check yourself out in the mirror and admire your figure. Then you try on the clothes you'd brought in. A skirt and sleeveless shirt combo, then jeans and a turtleneck sweater. Then you pull on a formal dress, struggling with the zipper in the back, but marveling on how well it accentuates your body. "I think she'll be okay with me buying this," you say aloud.

A couple minutes later you emerge from the store with your newly purchased dress and think about what to do next.

11213122.content:
Three weeks later...

...It's felt like forever since you and your mother swapped lives, even though it's only been twenty days. For a first week you had a mild freak-out every time you woke up to discover yourself lying next to your father, in this body. Soon your mind seemed to adjust though. Now you barely registered the difference in the morning, or the change in how your body felt. When you talked Elisa in the afternoons, she would say much the same thing. It was strange how rapidly their minds adjusted to having different bodies.

Elisa seemed to be having a blast living your life. She always seemed to come home from classes with a smile and spent most of the weekends out with friends. Very quickly, she also began dating a classmate named Kelly, the cute girl you'd seen her talking to before. It seemed like every other night Kelly and Elisa were going out. Sometimes the two of them would come over to your house to 'study' and you had to endure the sight of your mother being all couply with another woman, as you. When you tried to talk to Elisa about it, she'd just write it off. "I'm trying to unwind and have a little fun," she would say. "Besides, I'm getting you an excellent girlfriend." The subject of swapping back hadn't come up- Elisa had gone through a lot in life raising you and your sisters, so you felt you owed it to her to let her have a break for a few weeks. You just wished she wasn't enjoying your life so much. It made you feel uncomfortable.

In the interim, you went to her job as a model. It wasn't bad at all- well, okay, that was an understatement. You loved it. Really. The hair, the outfits, the posing, the cameras. You'd always been attracted to theater and this felt like theater on a professional scale. And was it ever self-affirming! There were times when you'd look into the mirror in the changing room after having your makeup done and, instead of thinking "that's my mom staring back at me" would think "wow! I look fabulous!" it took a lot of work to be a model and you understood why Elisa wanted the break, but really it was a very enjoyable job.

Less enjoyable was living her home life. No one else knew about the swap, so you had to pretend to be her. Your sisters could be a handful at times- aren't all teenage girls- but it was your father that was giving you the biggest headache. He kept on making passes at you. Each time you'd distract him with a scientific question or a suggestion for his machines (he still hadn't tested his body switching one yet, as he hadn't found another participant yet) and he'd run off. But it was exhausting and you knew you couldn't keep this up for too much longer.

One day you came home from work and walked into the kitchen to see:

A while later, you and Amber notice a long yellow vehicle speed past the house.

"That's the bus!" Amber says excitedly. "Dad will be home any minute."

"What am I supposed to do?" You say anxiously.

"Just follow my lead." Amber replies, and goes next to the front door, leering outside through the peephole. You follow behind, far enough so that you aren't both crowding the area. You stay in the family room, which is adjacent to the front door.

You hear the sound of a key turning the lock, and the brass doorknob move. The door opens, and at the door was Amber's body. She was wearing a black cardigan over a bright pink shirt, skin-tight jeans, and checkerboard womens' Vans shoes.

Amber, in Dad's body, immediately speaks. "Good afternoon, 'sweetie'! How was your day?"

"Sociologically stunning." You hear Amber's body answer. "The schema of a high school student has certainly changed in my day. Not necessarily lucid, but--"

"That's great Dad" Amber interrupts, not caring about her dad's analysis of her life. "Can we switch back now please?"

"We had discussed this earlier today, 'dad', remember? My research is dependent on the continual observation of two test subjects applied to the switch."

"Yeah I know that," Amber quickly counters, expecting him to say that. "But if I told you that two other people had already used your machine, would you study them instead and make us back to normal?

"Well, I don't see why not, honey. But I have checked the memory logs of the bodyswap machine, and its history shows no prior initiations to have occurred."

It was then when your realized your role in Amber's plan. "Oh Mike, can you come here please?" You heard your father's voice call out. You walk into the room with Amber and Dad. For the next few minutes, you relate the story of how you switched bodies with Mom, and how she had been dating Kelly and going to school while you had been going to the modelling agency and caring for the family over the past few weeks.

Your dad is visibly confused. "But... but.. but this makes... this is hard to believe. The memory logs said--"

"Dad" You say in your mother's breathy voice. "Mom may have been watching you build the machine, or she could have learned how to delete the history of switching on the machine. Somehow, she knew how to switch us, so she could have known how to avoid being detected by you."

"You pulled it off so well..." he sputters. "You mean to say that I've been sleeping with--"

"Yes. Dad. And if you want, you can include Mom and me in your research instead of you and Amber." The three of you walk into the family room, and you all sit on the couch. Amber is nearly overjoyed; your dad looks defeated and embarrassed; you seem to be the only one even-keeled in their emotions at the moment.

"While I suppose you are telling the truth, Mike" He says your name emphatically. "Mike, I can't swap back into my body yet. Today I talked to a boy. (Incredible!) And the boy and I are going out on-- what did he say, again?-- a date!"

"WHAT?" Amber yells. "What is his name?" Your dad tells her the name of the boy, and Amber almost faints. You don't know who Amber likes, but you suspect that he may be her crush or something.

"Dad.. you HAVE to switch back with me!" Amber says resolutely. She grabs her old arm and tries dragging her to the shed. But since your dad is rather weak in the upper body, Amber can't move her old body far.

"And what if I don't want to switch back?" your dad smiles broadly, almost relishing in this confrontation.

You try a shot in the dark. "Now listen to me Dad! I'm your mother right now, and if you don't go with Amber THIS INSTANT and switch back, then I'm going to ground you and not let you go on that date, young lady!" Trying to be serious, you fold your arms over your breasts and give him 'the look' that Mom usually gives him when she is angry.

Tension. Silence. Finally, your dad says, "Fascinating! Somehow, I am getting this feeling of pressure or fear. Is it of being punished by my 'mother'? Fascinating, just fascinating!" He pauses. "Okay then, Mike. Amber, you've got it. Let's go to the shed and switch back."

"Thank you so much! Thank you daddy!" Amber practically jumps up and down with relief, but in Dad's body she sounds humorously odd.

"I'll do it" your dad repeats, "on one condition. That I continue this research with your mother and Mike." They both turn to you.

"What do you say, Mike?" Amber pleads. "You can stay as Mom for a little while longer, right??"


It's decision time. What do you do?

A month later...

You wake up to the sound of your alarm clock. Wait, did you just call it your alarm clock? Anyway, you get out of bed and get dressed, removing your nightie and slipping on a blue bra and matching panties. A pair of tight jeans and a dark green sweater follow. It's gotten cold out after all. Your sister is still asleep on the other side of the bed, snoring lightly. In a way, her swapping with dad is good. Now you no longer have to worry about your father trying to get frisky with you, and vice versa for Amber. Still, she's been in something of a depression. Going from a popular and attractive woman to a middle-aged man is objectively terrible and she's taken to reading all day and watching tv in silence. You're the only person she really talks to now, as you know what she's going through.

Downstairs, you leave out lunch bags for Ember, your father, and Elisa. Ember is herself as always; you are glad at least one person hasn't been swapped around. Your father and mother told each other about their swaps weeks ago and have been helping each other since. Despite your father's social and stylistic incompetence, with Elisa's help he has been able to keep her popularity and appearance largely intact. So much so that he's been invited out on a couple dates with football players. Amber tried to get him to stay home, even grounding him, but he insisted on going each time. "It's a sociological experience," he explained. "I can't refuse this opportunity."

Elisa hasn't been much better. She's still dating Kelly. In fact, she even invited Kelly over for dinner a week ago. It was so awkward sitting at the dinner table making small chat with her while she and Elisa were flirting. Poor Kelly had no idea that her boyfriend Mike was in fact his mother Elisa and his mother she was talking to was in fact Mike. And later that night, when the two of them sat on the couch cuddling while watching a movie, you hid upstairs to cool your nerves. Elisa probably picked up on how angry you got; since then she's been good about not bringing Kelly around as much. There's still no word on when you'll be swapping back.

After a drive over to the studio, you get ready for today's work. It's a campaign for a local retailer specializing in wedding dresses. You model five different outfits over the course of six hours, admiring your reflection before the shoot each time. This really is the only positive of the swap. "Elisa dear, I have news for you!" He explains that he's been forwarding your photos and work to a number of different outlets, as the two of you discussed in a meeting last month. "A director over at Universal really liked them," he says. "The casting agent wants to cast you as one of the models in a film they're getting ready to shoot."

"A movie?" Your breath is practically gone.

"Yes!" he said excitedly. "You'd only have a few lines but you would get to interact with the main cast a fair bit. Normally they'd want to screen you first, but since you're a professional model, the role is small, and they start filming next week and desperately need this slot filled, they're making an exception here. What do you say Elisa?"

Running a hand through your thick blond hair, you respond, "forward me the information for the shoot and the pay, but right now I'm going to say yes."

"Great! And Elisa? Just to let you know, the shoot does start soon- next week, in fact- but they're going to be putting you up in a nice hotel in Hawaii for the entire eight days you'll be on the set. It's like a free vacation dear! Hope that helps you make up your mind."

You review the deal when your agent emails the details over and it is just as good as he said. Great pay for the short amount of work, a free trip to Hawaii with excellent lodgings, and the film has big-name stars headlining it. This sort of exposure will be excellent for your- er, your mom's- career.

When Elisa comes home you tell her about the offer and explain that you need to swap back for it now. "This is what you've been wanting to do for ages," you tell her. "Plus it's like a vacation, so you'd still be getting a break. Please can we switch back now?"

"Honey, I'd be wrong for this," she says. "I haven't modeled in nearly two months and it was your work that produced this offer. You should be the one to go enjoy it."

You're even becoming popular at school now. Plus your father needs me as long as he's staying as Amber. And you, you've been great as me. This is your scene, he says while handing you the script. We need you to say this line this way. And stand in such-and-such position over here. Try and look attractive but not too sultry. Shooting for your scene begins that night, which means you have some time to kill, so you put in a bikini and go to the beach. You wade out into the water until it's waist high, enjoying the waves caressing your body. You think briefly of how strangely comfortable you are in this body now. Six weeks ago you wouldn't have been okay walking around in a bikini in public, at least not unless it was for work. You would have been horrendously self-conscious a month ago. But after more than two months as Elisa, you've grown used to considering this your body. Because it is, for the moment at least.

Two guys ogle you as you come out of the water. It's almost flattering the way their eyes check you out. You give them a light wave with your girly hands before wrapping a towel around your waist and heading back to the hotel to get ready for the shoot.

It's nine at night and you're tired from jet lag, but it's time to film! Makeup took an hour, as did wardrobe, but finally everything's ready to start. The scene is a beach shoot- the main character is some sort of secret agent infiltrating a politico who lives in the tropics. Then comes the part where you come up to talk to him. You stroll over, hips swaying, and he and you do a back-and-forth flirting chat. You've totally gotten into the role, and Chris hasn't missed a beat either. They do maybe five takes for that. Then you're supposed to whisper a message in his ear and walk away. This time you lean in close to him, your breasts pressed up against his chest, as you slowly careen your head over to his ear and whisper the line of dialogue, because Mr. Finn, I might have something you want. You wake up the next day feeling exhilarated from filming the night before. Gone for the moment is any thought about your strange bodyswapped situation. Right now you're simply a supermodel on a movie shoot, and that's fine by you. After a long warm shower, you lounge around your hotel room in your bathrobe, reading the news and relaxing in comfort.

Around noon there's a knock on the door. You open it to see a man you recognize as Enrique, one of the minor-role actors on the set last night whom you had a great deal of fun chatting with. He looks up and down quickly, seeing you in your bathrobe, and says, "I'm sorry, I didn't know you weren't dressed."

You wave it away. "I'm fine. Come on in."

He walks slowly into the room, you noticing the broadness of his shoulders as he sits in one of your chairs. You plop on the edge of your bed, careful to cross your legs.

"I was just coming by to say you did a great job last night," he says. "Really. I didn't believe it when someone said this was your first time in an acting role. You aced that scene." His words make you blush a little; you sweep back your hair behind your ear and look down gingerly. "I'm sure you say that to all the pretty girls," you respond.

"No, just a few." He moves over to the bed and sits next to you. "You've got talent, Elisa. So I thought I would come by and... well really, just say that."

A warm feeling spreads over you. You look over at him earnestly and say, "I really appreciate it."

He gets up and heads to the door. "Hope to see you on set again this evening," he says and excuses himself out, leaving you with a charmed feeling. Only in the back of your mind is there a modicum of surprise over you having just been turned on by another man.

Realizing there's a good deal of time til filming starts again, you:

That night's shoot is a scene set in a large lobby. You have no lines of dialogue in this one, as you're meant to be in the background along with several other people. Makeup takes forever again, but you're fine with that. And this time they have you in a beautiful satin dress which dips low in the back, and beautiful stiletto heels. You mingle with the other background people in this scene, one of whom happens to be Enrique. "Ready for this Elisa?" he asks you, to which you respond with a broad smile.

Filming goes fast again, or at least it feels like it. The film's main actors charm everyone between takes with good humor and the director is easygoing, even as he does more takes than usual. You handle all the direction you're given perfectly; one of the girls on set compliments you on how quickly you adapt to whatever requests you're given. "It's all part of what modeling is like," you explain to rationalize it, but their compliments make you glow nonetheless.

After filming wraps up around 1am, about a dozen of you go out to a bar to celebrate with drinks. Back in regular clothes, you're excited for a good time on the town. You and Enrique play banter a lot during the night; he buys you a couple Long Islands and tries to get you to dance, but being a former guy you know better than to pretend you have anything by way of dance moves, much less feminine ones. It's a fun drunken time, with everyone out and enjoying themselves.

Finally at around 3am, you decide to go home. Since you're both drunk, you and Enrique walk to the hotel, him keeping you steady as you stumble a bit. Finally you get up to your place and into your room. "Thanks for helping me up here," you say to him, lightly patting his chest with your hand. "Not a problem. Thank you for keeping me company on the walk back," he responds, his eyes not leaving yours.

The two of you pause while the tension builds. In such close proximity, you can hear his breathing and yours as well. Can see desire in his eyes. In a smooth single move, his head swoops down, his lips connect with yours, and your eyes close softly. Maybe it's because you're drunk, or because after two months of being a woman these hormones have gotten to you, but you find yourself returning the kiss, wrapping your arms around his neck and pulling him close. The two of you lower onto your bed, kissing and holding each other passionately for what feels like forever.

All good things must eventually end though. After eight days of filming, your part in the movie is complete. The director gives you kudos and says he might contact your agent soon about another film role. In the meantime, you pack your things and get ready for the long flight back.

1221221211122.content:
You walk back home with all thats happened on your mind, concerned over your old self's status.

You go up to your room and begin to undress, thinking about a hot shower and something to relax you. The clock on the wall catches your eye.....its about 4:20pm. As you put on a robe and head for the bathroom, a hard but dull pain hits you in the back of the head, almost buckling your knees. "What the hell was that?" you think to yourself....maybe you did hurt yourself in the blast. It passes as quickly as it came and you shrug it off.

A hot shower relaxes you completely. You thought you would have enjoyed washing off your beautiful curves, but what happened today was preoccupying your mind. Several images were also flashing in your mind.....like scenes from a movie that seemed familiar but foggy. All the thoughts were of you and Jeff at various times throughout your marriage. It strikes you as odd, but too many other things to think about so you shrug it off.

A little after 5pm, you come out of the bathroom, feeling more relaxed and refreshed. A few minutes later, you hear Jeff come in from work. He comes into the bedroom.

"Hi beautiful" he says as he kisses you. "Ready for the big night? You didn't forget it did you?"

"Uh...no. Well....refresh my memory," you stammer with a smile like you're teasing him.

"Our big dinner date....time to rub some elbows with the big boys. What are you planning on wearing?"

"Umm....I don't know. Why don't you pick something out for me?" you ask.

"Sweetheart, you'd be buck naked if I had my way," he laughs. "I don't know - how about that little black dress you wore to my brother's wedding?"

"Ok...sure. For you - anything."

Then he adds...."Oh - by the way, did you hear about the kid next door?"

"Yeah...there was an explosion or something. I saw the squad over there," you say not wanting him to know you were actually THERE when it happened.

"Well, apparently the kid didn't make it." This freezes you in your tracks. "What?!" you ask. "My buddy's sister is a dispatch and told him about an explosion near our house and about how the kid didn't make it. I guess he died around 4:30 or so."

You immediately think of the headache about that same time and wonder if there was any connection.

"Thats too bad," you mumble in a daze.

"So you're Jeff's wife? I've heard alot about you...all good of course. Jeff's got a good head on his shoulders for business and obviously in his ability to pick a good woman," she says to you.

"Oh my! Are you alright? Perhaps you should lie down."

"No...no....I'm fine. Just a headache. Probably an allergy or something. I'm ok. Sorry about that."

"Let's sit down over here....." and you both proceed to a small den like room where its far more quiet.

"Well....you asked me about where I'm from? Well, I grew up in Springdale, about 3 hours from here. I was going to attend state at the local branch but my aunt got me a scholarship at Newport - she's was a board member there, but is now retired. Thats where Jeff and I met."

As you clean the kitchen up, it all reminds you of breakfast next door with your parents and sisters. As you think on it, something occurs to you - you can't remember what your middle name was. "Michael......uh. Mike - " You have no idea. Then you think of your best friend.....it takes you a minute but you can see his face....but no name. Then your sisters...."Amber and Em - Em - Emma?" You really don't know. WTF? You know Jeff's pet name - how to order in French and where Katie grew up and who her roommate in college was, among other things, but you can vaguely remember your own sisters' name? Although you're really adapting to being a woman, losing your identity scares you so you start to write a journal to try and remember the few things you still can.

The headaches! It has to be that. Every time you get one, you bet you're mentally transforming into Katie. The more you think about it, its not just a gradual thing either....seems some things sets it off more than others. Sex with your husband. Dressing up - anything that makes you FEEL like a woman. You don't have to wait long to find out.

Several hours later, you finally come to. "Wh-....what happened?" you mumble to yourself. Oh my God....your head is in such a fog. You can't hardly get your bearings. "The headaches" you remember. My God that one was a doozy. Well, everything seems to be working so apparently no harm done. You get up and feel really different. Not sick....just very different....but you think, in a good way.

You go to your closet to pick out something to wear and it hits you.....you feel so feminine! Wow....what a sensation. Maybe Jeff will come home for "lunch" again? Oh my God....you feel so horny as well. It never occurs to you that this was the result of the last wave - in a way, its all so normal to you. You feel like you just woke up in more ways than one.

Ahh....a nice sundress. Its supposed to be warmer today so that will be perfect. Too warm for pantyhose, so we'll just bare leg it today. You just shaved your legs last night in the tub, so they're nice and smooth....au natural.

Uh-oh...almost forgot your wedding ring. You put it in a cleaning solution last night before bed. As you slip it on, you look at your long painted fingernails and your beautiful feminine hands....and then remember when your husband first put that rock on your finger. You cried that day and thinking back, you almost begin to cry again. It then dawns on you...that rock means you are a wife. The crying reminds you that you are developing the emotions of a woman.

A little bit of makeup and you're ready to go.

After some small talk you think to yourself how nice it was to see her again....along with a crossing thought of how you even knew her....but you just did. Might be a good time to add some more to that memory journal you were keeping.

Later that night, after an incredible evening, you slip into a lilac corset and stockings you bought and were saving for a "special" occasion. Jeff is already in bed ready and waiting for you.....thanks goodness he felt the same way about children as you do.

You're a woman - a wife - and soon to be a mother. Time to start your own family.

We both ran into Dad's workshop. "Dad! Dad!" I cried. "You've got to help us!"
"Huh? Wha? What happened?" he stuttered. He noticed that I was losing balance in Ember's body, Ember was nervously clenching her thighs in mine, and we both looked EXTREMELY uncomfortable...
"Oh, no, you didn't! Yes, you did! My experiment was a success! But wait, maybe not...test, I need a test..."he began muttering under his breath. Then he drew himself up and tried to look stately. "Not now, kids, I'm very busy. I've gotta go buy a big, lush fur coat for your Grandma's birthday present!"
"NO!!!" My body shrieked.
"Ah! It did work! Let me shake your hands! This is incredible!" He went on congratulating himself, then said "So...there was some sort of problem?"
I looked at him incredulously. "I don't want to be my SISTER!" I yelled.
"And I don't want to be him!" Ember piped up.
"But aren't you excited about the sensations your new body is sending you, the new, mysterious emotions, seeing life from the other side-
"Oh, Dad, that stuff only happens in those perverted body-switching stories on the internet!" I yelled.
"Hmm, yes. I suppose you're right. Well, the way to switch back is to use the machine again, but...there's the slight chance of a glitch. You could be thrown out of your body and end up inside anyone in the world! It's kind of a bug I need to work out..."

1421111121111.content:
Katherine, in Ember's body, drag you and Amber out of the door. You realize she is right, you do need to get to school. In the back of your mind, you were considering switching back, but now, you are definitely stuck going to school as a girl. Well, at least you are in Amber's body, which is nice since you will be beautiful and popular.

When you get to school, you do find you are treated very differently. One thing was expected, since you are Amber now, people treat you better. Other things are a surprise, like they way some guys treat you. You find your looks make you a frequent target of unwanted touches and outright being groped. You can't believe how frequently it happens and how often you don't even know who did it.

Then you come face to face with the next thing you did not consider, Jason, Amber's boyfriend! You did not think you could be more shocked than when he took you into his arms and began to kiss you passionately, but when he began to run his hands over your body, you could feel sensations that you never experienced before, and they felt good! You found yourself kissing him back with equal passion! When he finally broke the kiss, you were literally panting!

Jason smiled down at you, "That is to give you something to think about between now and our date tonight honey! Gotta go to class now though." He gave you another peck on the lips and a squeeze on your rear, and this time, you did not mind at all!

You could feel the tingle between your legs as you watched him walk away. If this is what it felt like to be a girl, you were not only liking it, but you hoped your sister would let you stay in her body long enough to go on that date with Jason!

Since Amber was more concerned about beauty than brains, you have no problem keeping up with her classes. At lunch, you see Katherine/Ember just sitting down to eat. You gasp and say, "What are you doing? A cheeseburger! You know that Ember is vegetarian!"

She smiles up at you, "Yes, and I am going to change that as long as I am in her body." She took a bite and sighed, "I think her body was craving this, because I never had a cheeseburger taste so good."

You are alarmed, "Stop it! Even it you are right, her body is not used to meat, you could make her sick!" She ignored you, so you threatened her, "If you don't stop, I will text her and tell her what you are doing. Then I will suggest she take all your furs and dip them all in paint!"

She stopped at that and stared at you, "How do I know that she is not already doing that now that you mention it?"

You sigh, "Because unlike you, she is not spiteful and she respects the property of others. If she didn't, you would have known it before now."

She sat the burger down and sighed, "Okay, but if she does anything to my furs, she will be eating steak tonight!"

At lunch, you find that you enjoy chatting about clothing and boys with some of Amber's friends. It is easy to fall into it because you have know all of them for years anyhow, just not like this. When the school day ends, you have to admit, you enjoyed your day as a girl, and you wouldn't mind extending the stay.

When you finally get home, you go up to 'your' room. You see Amber sitting there waiting for you. You wonder what she will say?
